thread.title: Beheaded body found in Sokoto refuse dump
thread.title_full: Beheaded body found in Sokoto refuse dump

author: adekunle
title: Beheaded body found in Sokoto refuse dump
text:
Home » News » Beheaded body found in Sokoto refuse dump Beheaded body found in Sokoto refuse dump On 11:03 pm In News by adekunle Comments 
By Abdallah el-Kurebe T he decapitated body of a man was, Monday morning, found at a refuse dump on Maituta Road in Sokoto metropolis, wrapped in a sack. 
Commissioner of Police, Mohammed Abdulkadir, confirmed the incident to Vanguard. 
He said although no arrest had been made, “the body has been deposited at Usmanu Danfodiyo University Teaching Hospital, UDUTH, Sokoto.” adekunle
